_comments.client: Runs on user's machine - filesystem, process, network access
_comments.server: Runs on pml.casys.ai - stateless computation, external APIs
_comments.default: Unknown tools route to client (safe fallback)
_comments.agent_tools: std:agent_* routed to client for BYOK (user provides OPENAI_API_KEY or ANTHROPIC_API_KEY)
_comments.specificity: More specific patterns win (std:agent_* beats std:* for std:agent_delegate)
